#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
int test;
string s;
scanf("%d",&test);
while(test--)
{
cin>>s;
for(int i=s.length()-1;i>=0;i--)
if(s[i]=='4'){
if(i==s.length()-1)
{s[i]='7';break;}
else
{s[i]='7';
s[i+1]='4';break;}

}

else if(s[i]=='7')
{s[i]='4';
if(i==0)
s='4'+s;
}

cout<<s<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
